key_phrases: Spread the money to more artists
30k going to one person does not guarantee anything
does not guarantee more money for the city
does not guarantee the artist will uplift the community
Focus on artists who actually build a community
not just views, not just likes, not just followers
real impact in their message and ability to bring people together should be more important
barriers_identified: concentration of funding in few individuals
funding based on popularity metrics rather than community impact
solutions_proposed: Prioritize artists who build community and have real impact
De-emphasize metrics like views, likes, and followers in funding decisions
